name: Flowchain
description: Flowchain is an IoT project that leverages distributed ledger technology (DLT) for peer-to-peer IoT networks and real-time data transaction. Flowchain's PPKI technology provides random and unique public keys in real-time for tokenized hardware that enables the fast and safe transfer of transacted digital assets without the need for any intermediaries. As Flowchain's digital asset, FLC ensures the security and validity of data through tokenized IoT hardware.
